amendment.description: Amendment requires financial institutions to provide notice to customers if their account is ordered terminated by a Federal banking regulator.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 114-414 to require notice to banking customers if a customer account is terminated at the direction of federal banking regulators.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Gosar.
